{'Zion 4': {'price': 145.0, 'brand': 'Nike', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P022', 'rating': 4.5, 'reviews': ['Excellent cushioning on court.', 'Very supportive for lateral movement.', 'Design looks great.', 'Runs slightly narrow.']}, 'Adidas Running Shoes': {'price': 80.49, 'brand': 'Adidas', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P024', 'rating': 4.4, 'reviews': ['Very comfortable for daily training.', 'Good balance between cushioning and responsiveness.', 'Breathability is excellent.', 'A bit pricey but reliable.']}, 'PUMA Running Shoes': {'price': 102.99, 'brand': 'PUMA', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P025', 'rating': 4.1, 'reviews': ['Stylish and comfortable.', 'Good traction on pavement.', 'Slightly stiff at first.', 'Breaks in after a few runs.']}, 'Air Jordan 4 Shoes': {'price': 220.0, 'brand': 'Nike', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P026', 'rating': 4.7, 'reviews': ['Iconic design and premium feel.', 'Very comfortable for casual wear.', 'Not ideal for long basketball sessions.', 'Expensive but worth it for fans.']}, 'Vomero 18 Shoes': {'price': 155.0, 'brand': 'Nike', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P027', 'rating': 4.6, 'reviews': ['Amazing cushioning for long runs.', 'Feels very stable.', 'Upper is breathable and soft.', 'Great for daily mileage.']}, 'Air Force 1 GORE-TEX Shoes': {'price': 150.0, 'brand': 'Nike', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P028', 'rating': 4.3, 'reviews': ['Water resistance works well.', 'Classic look with extra durability.', 'Slightly heavier than regular AF1.', 'Good for rainy days.']}, 'Stackable Bamboo Shoe Rack': {'price': 28.0, 'brand': 'ErgoLife', 'category': 'Home', 'product_id': 'P038', 'rating': 4.2, 'reviews': ['Very easy to assemble, took me only 10 minutes.', 'Fits perfectly in my narrow entryway. Bamboo looks very clean.', "Sturdy enough for heavy boots, doesn't wobble at all."]}}
